Minute Entry for proceedings held before Judge John A. Houston: Sentence With PSR Hearing held on 7/27/2015 for Johnny Eduardo Cabrera (1). Count 1, Custody of the BOP for thirty-six months, supervised release for three with conditions. No fine. $100.00 penalty assessment. Appeal waived. The Court recommends the residential drug abuse program and that custody be served in the Western Region. (Court Reporter/ECR Cami Kircher). (Plaintiff Attorney Emily Allen, AUSA, s/a). (Defendant Attorney Elliot N. Kanter). (no document attached) (lwm) (Entered: 07/27/2015)
